snippet: Middle linebacker Ray Lewis, who has been a Super Bowl most valuable player and a two-time N.F.L. defensive player of the year, announced Wednesday that he would retire after this season.
abstract: Baltimore Ravens linebacker Ray Lewis announces that he will retire following the 2012-2013 NFL season.
lead_paragraph: Middle linebacker Ray Lewis, who has been a Super Bowl most valuable player and a two-time N.F.L. defensive player of the year, announced Wednesday that he would retire after this season.

headline.seo: Ray Lewis, Ferocious Face of Ravens and N.F.L., Is Retiring
headline.main: Lewis, Ferocious Face of Ravens and N.F.L., Will Retire After Season
headline.print_headline: Lewis, Ferocious Face of Ravens and N.F.L., Will Retire After Season
